content: <?xml-stylesheet href="#style" type="text/css"?> <ARTICLE>   <EXTRAS id="style">     INSTRUMENT { display: inline }     ARTICLE, HEADLINE, AUTHOR, PARA { display: block }     EXTRAS { display: none }   </EXTRAS>   <HEADLINE>Fredrick the Great meets Bach</HEADLINE>   <AUTHOR>Johann Nikolaus Forkel</AUTHOR>   <PARA>     One evening, just as he was getting his      <INSTRUMENT>flute</INSTRUMENT> ready and his     musicians were assembled, an officer brought him a list of     the strangers who had arrived.   </PARA> </ARTICLE>
